Home Timeline People

USA Internet History

Explore and celebrate the people (1995 - Present) that shaped the internet in the USA into what it is today!

Behind Every Breakthrough...

Behind every major breakthrough in internet technology stands a person, or a team, whose vision, creativity, or determination helped shape the way we connect and communicate today. This people section highlights some of the key figures whose contributions defined the internet era in the United States from 1995 to today.

Pioneers of the Early Web
